summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Willow Street, from the alley west of Seward Park Avenue to Rainier Avenue by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9614 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
